attributes.action: Insist that Mr Kibaki step down as President of Kenya in favour of Mr Odinga
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Kibaki rigged the presidential election in Kenya and stole the presidency, leading to untold suffering for ordinary Kenyans in the country.  It is not enough for the British Government to press for a 'National Unity' government, rather they should press for the immediate removal of Mr Kibaki as president.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
